Weekly Monitoring ReportForwarded by George HopleyHOUECT on PM HGP Inc on AM To cc Subject Weekly Monitoring Report Attached are the two files providing the Weekly Monitoring Report One file includes the summary page and the other file has the detail for each unit monitored The monitoring report for the eight Western units has been sent to Tim Belden If you have any questions please call Dan East Summary doc Eastdoc

SO limits on fuelswitchingForwarded by George HopleyHOUECT on PM From Jennifer Fraser PM To Julie A CT Alex nron George ct cc Subject SO limits on fuelswitching Enron North America Corp From Jeff Andrews ENRON To Jennifer CT cc John CT Kevin NRON George ct Subject SO limits on fuelswitching Jen Please see the attached note Let me know if you have any additional questions

RE Next visit to Houston Cc so would the Northeast trader John Suarez Vince J Kaminski PM To George ct cc Vince J CT Subject RE Next visit to Houston George Would you like to take a like at the service see below The meeting is on July at th floor Vince Forwarded by Vince J KaminskiHOUECT on PM Edward Krapels on PM Please respond to To Vince J Kaminski cc Jeffrey Shorter Email Subject RE Next visit to Houston Vince Good to hear from you and Im glad youre available How is Wednesday at I did look at EOL and am not surprised to see its quality I was unable to say much about it in my Risk Electricity Hedging and Trading report because of deadline pressures How is the site doing I am intrigued by the competition for trading platforms and was astonished to hear that Goldman Morgan BP and Shell were going to launch a site to compete with yours Talk about a shotgun marriage If we have time next week I could step you through our website wwwweathereffectscom Im very proud of what weve done I cant give out a password yet but would be happy to walk through the site with you over the phone using my password Its a very ambitious site with stateoftheart WSI weather seasonal and day to day driving a good load model for PJM and NEPOOL ESAI contributes oil and gas input price forecasts capacity judgments and herding ideas to develop power price forecasts for same time periods After one months fullbore effort Im pleased with the results eg we forecast Nepool onpeak to be and it turned out Have a great weekend Ed Original Message From Vince J Kaminski mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Cc Vince J Kaminski Shirley Crenshaw Subject Re Next visit to Houston Ed I shall be available on both days What about Wednesday July between and Please let me know what time would work for you It will be nice to see you again Vince PS By the way did you have a chance to take a look at the EOL Edward Krapels on PM Please respond to To Vince J CT cc Subject Next visit to Houston Dear Vince I will be returning to Houston during the week of July ESAI and Weather Services International have launched after more than months of RD our service called Energycast Power Trader and Energycast Gas Trader for power traders in Nepool and PJM I would be happy to review the service with you as well as take you on a tour of our web site Are you available on July Sincerely Ed Krapels

Re Wholesale market infoto Don Black Forwarded by George HopleyHOUECT on PM George Hopley PM To Donald M ECT Origination CT cc Subject Re Wholesale market info Attached are the requested data Please note each in different formats Sales for resale can be obtained from this file These are found at the following EIADOE website cneafelectricityepavhtmltablesepavtphtml Power Marketer and New Capacity rankings These are compiled from Megawatt daily and PIRA consulting group Reserve Margins Price Volatility and reserve margins This is presented in Power Point TLRs Here is a file that details TLRs over time Call me with any questions George From Donald M ECT Origination Black PM To George ct cc Benjamin CT Subject Wholesale market info George As I mentioned I may have to give a presentation Thursday to some Japanese utilities re the North American power market I was hoping your group could help me with some generic market background information Wholesale volumes sale for resale by quarter by NERC region since if possible Power marketer rankings national volumes New plant MW coming on line by NERC region by year Load and reserve margins by NERC region Measures of wholesale power price volitility by region since possibly overlayed on reserve margins Do we track instances of line loading relief by region Any help on the above would be greatly appreciated regards Don

J Racingsent this guy your credentials he emailed back and said tomorrow he will let us know if his phantom crew ever called him back As of today he had heard nothing Ill get back to you Forwarded by George HopleyHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject J Racing Well Laurel told me you are interested in crewing in the upcoming Circuit race th th Sounds good How much experience to you have on the pointy end of the boat I have a tentative crew but he would like to do middle and tactics He was supposed to get back with me over the weekend but has not done so yet Laurel mentioned that you know someone else They have any experience How are you on tactics Greg
